description: '''The Mock Turtles''' are an English [[indie rock]] band, formed in [[Middleton, Greater Manchester]], in 1985, who enjoyed some success in the early 1990s. Their most famous song "[[Can You Dig It (The Mock Turtles song)|Can You Dig It?]]", which was released in the UK in 1991, charted at number 18. When the song was re-released in slightly remixed form in 2003, it again reached the top 20 of the [[UK Singles Chart]].
